name: Randomly Powered Platformer
description:
Press z to jump, press x to use your power!

Your power will be one of the following randomly: double jump, dash, and levitate.

Rush through the level  to grab that flag!

This game is based on "2D Platformer Microgame" template in Unity. I'm a one-man team so this is the most efficient way to get a game done. Most assets were taken from the template, except the power icons made by my friend Raven.

I thought a platformer with some randomness would be fun and exciting, but I just didn't have the time to design the level. I hope you can still catch the idea of planning the move sets in realtime because of the randomness.

This is also the first time I successfully get a game done in this jam. Last year my game was unplayable due to bugs and I still have not fix them lol. 

Enough of mumbling, anyway thanks for playing my game. Feel free to leave rating or comment. I'll be grateful.
